sentences.en: A projection of the mind －－ a form of astral projection?
sentences.cn: 这是不是一种意念的投射--一种存在于有形世界之上的超感觉的投射方式 呢 ?

sentences.en: Also see: Astral Realms & Kingdoms , Astral Sub - Planes, Astral Entrance Structure.
sentences.cn: 参见: 星体领域 和 国度 、 星体亚层 、 星体入口的结构.

sentences.en: Astral Projection. Projects you and friends into Astral Plane.
sentences.cn: 星界投射: 将自己及伙伴投射到星界.

sentences.en: Astral reading in the 55 districts is at abnormal level. Investigate.
sentences.cn: 55地区有异常反应, 立刻去调查.

sentences.en: He covers everything under the sun from personal development to astral projection.
sentences.cn: 他涵盖一切在阳光下,从个人发展到星光投影.

sentences.en: It can also attract the unwanted attention of undesirable astral entities.
sentences.cn: 这也会吸引你不需要的星体实体的不必要的注意.

sentences.en: Most of the manipulations occur instead in the etheric or astral planes.
sentences.cn: 大部分操控反之发生在以太或星光层.

sentences.en: Note: Blind people are not blind in astral form.
sentences.cn: 注意: 盲人处于星体躯体中时能够看见.

sentences.en: Once the astral body has separated, it is free to create dreams.
sentences.cn: 一旦星体躯体脱体, 它就具有创造梦境的自由.
灵魂出窍的体验和灵魂飘游

sentences.en: Probability Travel. You and friends physically enter Astral Plane.
sentences.cn: 星界旅行: 你与伙伴以真身进入星界.

sentences.en: She was amazed at the number of astral bodies the new telescope revealed.
sentences.cn: 从这台新的望远镜里竟能看到那么多的星体,这把她惊呆了.

sentences.en: The astral configuration today encourages you to go to extremes.
sentences.cn: 今天的星体结构会鼓励走极端.

sentences.en: These are the astral, mental and buddhist fields of energy.
sentences.cn: 它们是星体 、 精神和布迪克能量场.

sentences.en: This is similar to what happens after a low powered astral journey.
sentences.cn: 低能量的星体旅行之后发生的情形与此相似.

sentences.en: This latter geometry he called astral geometry.
sentences.cn: 这后一种几何他称为星空几何.

words.tran_cn: 星的；星际的；精神世界的

trans.tran_en: relating to ideas and experiences connected with the mind and  spirit  rather than the body
